Back to Sergei Prokofiev

Sergei Prokofiev

Ten Pieces from Romeo and Juliet, op. 75

1937

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 35'

  • 1. Folk Dance
  • 2. Scene (The Street Awakens)
  • 3. Minuet (Arrival of the Guests)
  • 4. Juliet as a Young Girl
  • 5. Masquers
  • 6. Montagues and Capulets
  • 7. Friar Laurence
  • 8. Mercutio
  • 9. Dance of the Girls with Lilies
  • 10. Romeo and Juliet before Parting

These pieces are arrangements of music from the ballet Romeo and Juliet (op. 64). Prokofiev also created three orchestral suites from the ballet: op. 64bis (which includes nos. 1–3 and 5 of op. 75), op. 64ter (which includes nos. 4, 6–7 and 9–10 of op. 75) and op. 101.

1. Folk Dance

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Scene (The Street Awakens)

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Minuet (Arrival of the Guests)

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5

4. Juliet as a Young Girl

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 3.5

5. Masquers

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

6. Montagues and Capulets

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 3

7. Friar Laurence

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

8. Mercutio

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

9. Dance of the Girls with Lilies

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2

10. Romeo and Juliet before Parting

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 3.5
